name: Crashog
description:
!!IN DEVELOPMENT!!

Crashog is a 2D platformer starring an extremely mobile hedgehog (No not that one!). Use the unique crashing mechanic to richochet off walls and make your way around the level.

Controls: 

Move: Arrow Keys, WASD, or DPAD

Jump: Z, Space, or A on Controller

Crash: X, Left Shift, or X/B on Controller

Restart Demo: R, or Select on Controller

Crashog is an in development game for this year's GBJam, but I thought I'd upload what I have a little early to get some feedback. The demo here contains about a fifth of the final planned jam entry, although I'd love to take the game a little farther after that.
